channel.title: webkit2gtk on SoBo's Dev Log
channel.description: Recent content in webkit2gtk on SoBo's Dev Log

item.title: Block ads in WebKitGtk
item.description: One of the most requested features (and for a good reason) in Feeds has always been ad blocking. I never came around to implement it, mostly because I couldn’t find a guide or any similar resource, except for GNOME Web’s source code, and that’s not exactly easy to navigate.
